actionCalls.name: Create_Request_Record_with_case_assignment_rule
actionCalls.label: Create Request Record with case assignment rule

assignments.name: Assign_value_in_case_record_variable
assignments.label: Assign value in case record variable

value.stringValue: Hardware Request for {!VarName} - Details can be found in Service Request Details section

formulas.name: RegionSection
formulas.expression: IF({!Request_Type}="Accessories", "Hardware Accessories" + {!NewLine}, "") + If({!Docking_Station} = TRUE,{!Space}+ "Docking Station"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Docking_Station1} = TRUE,{!Space}+ "Docking Station"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Docking_Station2} = TRUE,{!Space}+ "Docking Station"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset_Wired}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Headset Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset_Wired1}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Headset Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset_Wired3}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Headset Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset_Wired2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Headset Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Wired}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Laptop_Charger}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Laptop Charger"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Laptop_Charger1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Laptop Charger"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Laptop_Charger2}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Laptop Charger"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Laptop_Charger3}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Laptop Charger"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Laptop_Charger4}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Laptop Charger"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Dual2}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitors Dual"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Dual1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitors Dual"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Dual}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitors Dual"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Single1} = TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Single3} = TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Single2} = TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Single4} = TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Monitor_Single} = TRUE, {!Space}+"Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Mouse_Wired}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Mouse Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other2}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other4}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other3}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Printer1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Printer"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Printer2}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Printer"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Printer3}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Printer"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Desktop_Speaker_Jabra}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Desktop Speaker (Jabra)"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Desktop_Speaker_Jabra2}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Desktop Speaker (Jabra)"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Webcam_Wired}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "External Webcam Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Webcam_Wired2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "External Webcam Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Mouse_Combo_Wireless}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Mouse Combo Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Mouse_Combo_Wireless2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Mouse Combo Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Wireless2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Mouse_Wireless2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Mouse Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset3}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Headset"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard3}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Keyboard"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Mouse3}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Mouse"+{!NewLine}," ")

formulas.name: RequestFormula
formulas.expression: If(NOT(ISNULL({!RequestedFor.recordName})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!RequestedFor.recordName})), "Requested For - " +{!RequestedFor.recordName} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If(NOT(ISNULL({!Requested_By})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Requested_By})), {!Requested_By} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Region})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Region}))), " Region - " +{!Region} + {!NewLine},null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Brand})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Brand}))), " Brand - " +{!Brand} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Brand3})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Brand3}))), " Brand - " +{!Brand3} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If(NOT(ISNULL({!LocationOffice})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!LocationOffice})), {!LocationOffice} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}))), " How will the resource receive their hardware - " +{!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Request_Type})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Request_Type}))), " Request Type - " +{!Request_Type} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Laptop_Type})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Laptop_Type}))), " Laptop Type - " +{!Laptop_Type} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Laptop_Type1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Laptop_Type1}))), " Laptop Type - " +{!Laptop_Type1} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Laptop_Type3})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Laptop_Type3}))), " Laptop Type - " +{!Laptop_Type3} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ {!VarRequest}+ {!RegionSection}+{!NewLine} + If((NOT(ISNULL({!Additional_Information1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Additional_Information1}))), "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information1} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Additional_information2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Additional_information2}))), "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_information2} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Additional_Information})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Additional_Information}))), "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information} + {!NewLine} ,null)

formulas.name: VarAddress
formulas.expression: 'Shipping Address'+ {!NewLine} + If((NOT(ISNULL({!Address_1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Address_1}))), {!Space}+ "Address 1 - " +{!Address_1} +{!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Address_2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Address_2}))), {!Space}+ "Address 2 - " +{!Address_2} +{!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!City})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!City}))), {!Space}+"City - " +{!City} +{!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!State_Province})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!State_Province}))), {!Space}+"State Province - " +{!State_Province} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Zip_Postal_Code})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Zip_Postal_Code}))), {!Space}+"Zip Postal Code - " +{!Zip_Postal_Code} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Country})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Country}))), {!Space}+"Country - " +{!Country} ,null) +{!VarDisAddress}

formulas.name: VarCheckbox1
formulas.expression:
IF({!Headset_Wired}, 1, 0) + IF({!Other2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Laptop_Charger}, 1, 0) + IF({!Keyboard_Wired}, 1, 0) + IF({!Docking_Station1}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Dual}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Single}, 1, 0) + IF({!Mouse_Wired}, 1, 0) + IF({!Printer2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Desktop_Speaker_Jabra}, 1, 0) + IF({!Docking_Station}, 1, 0) + IF({!External_Webcam_Wired}, 1, 0) + IF({!Headset_Wired1}, 1, 0) + IF({!Keyboard_Mouse_Combo_Wireless}, 1, 0) + IF({!Laptop_Charger1}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Dual1}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Single1}, 1, 0) + IF({!Printer1}, 1, 0) + IF({!Other1}, 1, 0) + IF({!Headset_Wired2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Keyboard_Wireless2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Laptop_Charger2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Single3}, 1, 0) + IF({!Mouse_Wireless2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Other}, 1, 0) +
IF({!Headset3}, 1, 0) + IF({!Keyboard3}, 1, 0) + IF({!Laptop_Charger3}, 1, 0) + IF({!Mouse3}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Single4}, 1, 0) + IF({!Other4}, 1, 0) + IF({!Desktop_Speaker_Jabra2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Docking_Station2}, 1, 0) + IF({!External_Webcam_Wired2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Headset_Wired3}, 1, 0) + IF({!Keyboard_Mouse_Combo_Wireless2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Laptop_Charger4}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Dual2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Monitor_Single2}, 1, 0) + IF({!Other3}, 1, 0) + IF({!Printer3}, 1, 0)

formulas.name: VarDisAddress
formulas.expression: IF({!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Office based"|| {!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Pickup from an office",{!Space}+ "Address 1 - " +{!Get_All_Location.Innova_Street__c}+ {!NewLine}, "")+ IF({!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Office based"|| {!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Pickup from an office",{!Space}+ "City - " +{!Get_All_Location.Innova_City__c}+ {!NewLine}, "")+ IF({!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Office based"|| {!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Pickup from an office",{!Space}+ "State/Province - " +{!Get_All_Location.Innova_State__c}+ {!NewLine}, "")+ IF({!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Office based"|| {!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Pickup from an office",{!Space}+ "Zip/Postal Code - " +{!Get_All_Location.Zip_Postal_Code__c}+ {!NewLine}, "")+ IF({!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Office based"|| {!How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware}="Pickup from an office",{!Space}+ "Country - " +{!Get_All_Location.Innova_Country__c}+ {!NewLine}, "")

formulas.name: VarRequest
formulas.expression: IF({!Laptop_Type}="Developer", "" +{!Type_is_Laptop}+ {!NewLine}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Executive", "" +{!Type_is_Executive}+ {!NewLine}, "")+ IF({!Laptop_Type}="Mac", "" +{!Laptop_Mac}+ {!NewLine}, "")+ IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Developer", "" +{!Type_is_Laptop}+ {!NewLine}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Executive", "" +{!Type_is_Executive}+ {!NewLine}, "") +IF({!Laptop_Type3}="Developer", "" +{!Type_is_Laptop}+ {!NewLine}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type3}="Executive", "" +{!Type_is_Executive}+ {!NewLine}, "")

formulas.name: VarShip
formulas.expression: {!VarAddress}+{!NewLine}+ IF({!Personal_Email_Address}!=NULL, "Personal Email Address - " +{!Personal_Email_Address}+ {!NewLine}, "") + IF({!EmailAddress11}!=NULL, " Email Address - " +{!EmailAddress11}+ {!NewLine}, "")+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!CellNumber11})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!CellNumber11}))), "Cell Number - " +{!Country_Code_Canada.value}+{!Country_Code_India.value}+{!Country_Code_Mexico.value}+{!Country_Code_UK.value}+{!Country_Code_US.value}+({!Space1}+{!CellNumber11}) + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Cell_Number})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Cell_Number}))), "Personal Cell Number - " +{!Country_Code_Canada.value}+{!Country_Code_India.value}+{!Country_Code_Mexico.value}+{!Country_Code_UK.value}+{!Country_Code_US.value}+ ( {!Space1}+ {!Cell_Number}) + {!NewLine}+ {!NewLine} ,null)

Flow.interviewLabel: Innova-Hardware Request With Approval and Task II {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Portal - Hardware Request Form

recordLookups.name: Get_Case_Id_for_Case_Number
recordLookups.label: Get Case Id for Case Number

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText: Hardware Request was not created Please contact your salesforce system administrator.

fields.name: DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Case Number# {!Get_Case_Id_for_Case_Number.CaseNumber} has been created.

fields.name: How_will_the_resource_receive_their_hardware
fields.fieldText: How will the resource receive their hardware?

fields.name: LocationOffice
fields.fieldText: Office Location - {!Location.recordName}

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND ( 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)

fields.name: Display_massage
fields.fieldText: ﻿This request can only be used for existing Billable and Non-Billable resources. If a laptop is needed for a New Hire, use the New Hire Request Form.

fields.name: Type_is_Laptop
fields.fieldText:
Approval Required

This option is for Software Developers only and will require IT Approval.

fields.name: Type_is_Executive
fields.fieldText:
Approval Required

This option is for VPs and above and will require IT Approval.

fields.name: Laptop_Mac
fields.fieldText:
Approval Required

This option will require business justification or be a client requirement. IT Approval is required.

fields.name: Display2
fields.fieldText: City : {!Get_All_Location.Innova_City__c}

fields.name: Display4
fields.fieldText: Zip/Postal Code : {!Get_All_Location.Zip_Postal_Code__c}

fields.name: Display3
fields.fieldText: Country : {!Get_All_Location.Innova_Country__c}

validationRule.errorMessage: Cell number must be Numeric. Should be between 7 -15 digit long.
Cell number must be Numeric. Should be between 7 -15 digit long.
Please enter the correct email address
Please enter the correct email address

fields.name: DisplayMassage
fields.fieldText: Justification is needed in Additional Comments section.

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: 1 AND 7 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 )
